name: Realmrover
description:
Summary

A simple combat prototype made in about 3 weeks in Unity. Still very rough, but is being worked on currently. Please share your feedback and suggestions to shape the development of this project.

Planned features:
  • Roguelite mechanics, progression, and permanent upgrades.
  • Light story elements.
  • Many more classes and abilities!
  • Improvements to the UI, art, and game feel.
